pull.title: Avoid the use of abs64 in timedata

events.message: Avoid the use of abs64 in timedata

comments.body:
I think this is flipped. Now if `nMedian` is beyond the max `nTimeOffset` is set to `nMedian`, whereas it was the opposite before:

Example: max = 4, nMedian = -3
Before: abs64(-3) <= 4 → 3 <= 4 → true
Now: -3 < -4 || -3 > 4 → false
